Description:
Position Title:               StorekeeperEmployment Type:     Full Time  Salary:                        up to 3K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications Job Location:                Sharjah, UAE  About the Client:  A well-established metalwork and engineering company with several renowned projects in UAE. Job Description:  Plans and performs work that involves ordering, receiving, inspecting, returning, unloading, shelving, packing, labeling, pricing, delivering.
Update logs and documentation for inventory processing and report damaged or missing inventory to immediate supervisor.
Supervise the offloading of incoming materials and inspect quantity and quality in line with the requirements mentioned on the purchase orders, check for damage and discrepancies, then report to accounting for reimbursements and record keeping.
Ensure all stored materials should be easily accessible and safely handled as per HSE guidelines standards and procedures.
Move materials from facilities to workstations, pickup locations, or other locations as applicable.Skills
Skills:
Open to Indian, Pakistani, Nepali nationals
Male, 45 years old and below
At least 3 years of related experience in storekeeping, inventory control, and recordkeeping
Knowledge in safety and security practices, and basic mechanical concepts.
Advanced knowledge with using Excel (PIVOT & VLOOK UP) is required
Candidates who can join immediately will be prioritized
